stories.text:
https://www.getchestr.com/

Chestr is Pinterest + Honey. You can save anything you want from the Web in a single click, and get notifications if there are any discounts.

We're late for Xmas wishlists – but still wanted to share it with the community! :)
stories.title: Show HN: Shop Smarter wish Chestr, Universal Wishlist w/ Discount Monitoring
